text: Moein Abbasian (; born 18 August 1989) is an Iranian defender who currently plays for Iranian football club Saipa in the Persian Gulf Pro League.Iran - M. Abbasian - Profile with news, career statistics and history - Soccerway == Club career == Sadeghi joined Saba Qom in 2011 after spending the previous year at Sanati Kaveh.
